title: bundle: type error when parsing `$HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_DUMP_DESCRIBE` vs `--describe`
body:
### `brew doctor` output

```shell
Please note that these warnings are just used to help the Homebrew maintainers
with debugging if you file an issue. If everything you use Homebrew for is
working fine: please don't worry or file an issue; just ignore this. Thanks!

Warning: Some installed casks are deprecated or disabled.
You should find replacements for the following casks:
  chromium
  graphiql

Warning: Some installed kegs have no formulae!
This means they were either deleted or installed manually.
You should find replacements for the following formulae:
  dog

Warning: Some installed formulae are deprecated or disabled.
You should find replacements for the following formulae:
  sshfs-mac
  hey
  icu4c@76
  node@16
  php@7.2

Warning: You have unlinked kegs in your Cellar.
Leaving kegs unlinked can lead to build-trouble and cause formulae that depend on
those kegs to fail to run properly once built. Run `brew link` on these:
  numpy
```

### Verification

- [x] I ran `brew update` twice and am still able to reproduce my issue.
- [x] My "`brew doctor` output" above says `Your system is ready to brew` or a definitely unrelated `Tier` message.
- [x] This issue's title and/or description do not reference a single formula e.g. `brew install wget`. If they do, open an issue at https://github.com/Homebrew/homebrew-core/issues/new/choose instead.

### `brew config` output

```shell
HOMEBREW_VERSION: 4.6.4-102-ge910f91
ORIGIN: https://github.com/Homebrew/brew
HEAD: e910f91124dc0bb84368e183288629a2b83a817d
Last commit: 4 hours ago
Branch: main
Core tap HEAD: bad572fd56407b965c7952a1a57cb5eada6cd614
Core tap last commit: 14 minutes ago
Core tap JSON: 21 Aug 16:47 UTC
Core cask tap JSON: 21 Aug 16:47 UTC
HOMEBREW_PREFIX: /opt/homebrew
HOMEBREW_BAT: set
HOMEBREW_BAT_THEME: Monokai Extended
HOMEBREW_CASK_OPTS: ["--no-quarantine"]
HOMEBREW_EDITOR: vim
HOMEBREW_FORBID_PACKAGES_FROM_PATHS: set
HOMEBREW_GITHUB_API_TOKEN: set
HOMEBREW_MAKE_JOBS: 14
HOMEBREW_NO_AUTO_UPDATE: set
HOMEBREW_NO_ENV_HINTS: set
HOMEBREW_NO_UPDATE_REPORT_NEW: set
HOMEBREW_SORBET_RUNTIME: set
Homebrew Ruby: 3.4.5 => /opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/portable-ruby/3.4.5/bin/ruby
CPU: 14-core 64-bit arm_brava
Clang: 17.0.0 build 1700
Git: 2.51.0 => /opt/homebrew/bin/git
Curl: 8.7.1 => /usr/bin/curl
macOS: 15.6-arm64
CLT: 26.0
Xcode: 16.4
Rosetta 2: false
```

### What were you trying to do (and why)?

When executing the `brew bundle dump -f` command, an fatal error occurs indicating a type mismatch for the 'describe' parameter.

This is OK
```sh
brew bundle dump -f --describe
```

This is not anymore
```sh
export HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_DUMP_DESCRIBE=1
brew bundle dump -f
```

### What happened (include all command output)?

```sh
‚ùØ brew bundle dump -f
Error: Parameter 'describe': Expected type T::Boolean, got type String with value "1"
Caller: /opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/call_validation.rb:227
Definition: /opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/bundle/commands/dump.rb:15 (Homebrew::Bundle::Commands::Dump.run)
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/configuration.rb:296:in 'T::Configuration.call_validation_error_handler_default'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/configuration.rb:303:in 'T::Configuration.call_validation_error_handler'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/call_validation.rb:322:in 'T::Private::Methods::CallValidation.report_error'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/call_validation.rb:230:in 'block in T::Private::Methods::CallValidation.validate_call'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/signature.rb:234:in 'block in T::Private::Methods::Signature#each_args_value_type'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/signature.rb:228:in 'Hash#each'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/signature.rb:228:in 'T::Private::Methods::Signature#each_args_value_type'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/call_validation.rb:227:in 'T::Private::Methods::CallValidation.validate_call'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/_methods.rb:277:in 'block in Homebrew::Bundle::Commands::Dump._on_method_added'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/cmd/bundle.rb:208:in 'Homebrew::Cmd::Bundle#run'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/call_validation.rb:282:in 'UnboundMethod#bind_call'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/call_validation.rb:282:in 'T::Private::Methods::CallValidation.validate_call'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.4.0/gems/sorbet-runtime-0.5.12401/lib/types/private/methods/_methods.rb:277:in 'block in Homebrew::Cmd::Bundle#_on_method_added'
/opt/homebrew/Library/Homebrew/brew.rb:100:in '<main>'
Please report this issue:
  https://docs.brew.sh/Troubleshooting


```

### What did you expect to happen?

`brew bundle dump -f` generates a Brewfile located at $HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_FILE

### Step-by-step reproduction instructions (by running `brew` commands)

```shell
export HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_FILE="$HOME/Brewfile"
export HOMEBREW_BUNDLE_DUMP_DESCRIBE=1
brew bundle dump -f
```
